SEARCH
Module com.example.samplesalad
Package com.example.samplesalad.model

Class Pad

java.lang.Object
com.example.samplesalad.model.Pad
public class Pad extends Object
A triggerable object that holds and plays a sample, with properties for sensitivity, volume, and key binding, simulating the physical pads on an Akai MPC.

  • Constructor Summary

    Initializes the pad with a specific sample.
